com.aventstack.extentreports

Interface ExtentReporter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReportAggregatesListener, TestListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReporter, BasicFileReporter, ExtentHtmlReporter, ExtentXReporter

    public interface ExtentReporter
extends TestListener, ReportAggregatesListener
    Primary interface implemented by each reporter. This interface implements TestListener and ReportAggregatesListener interface to provide additional functionality to each reporter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void flush() 
      void start()
      Starts passing run information to the reporter
      void stop()
      Stops the reporter.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.aventstack.extentreports.TestListener

        onAuthorAssigned, onCategoryAssigned, onLogAdded, onNodeStarted, onScreenCaptureAdded, onTestStarted

      • Methods inherited from interface com.aventstack.extentreports.ReportAggregatesListener

        setCategoryContextInfo, setExceptionContextInfo, setStatusCount, setSystemAttributeContext, setTestList, setTestRunnerLogs

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Starts passing run information to the reporter

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the reporter. Ensures no information is passed to the reporter.

      • flush

        void flush()
